grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 拒否【キョヒ】refusal, rejection, denial, veto
拒絶反応【キョゼツハンノウ】(organ) rejection, unthinking dismissal, strong reaction (against)
着拒【チャッキョ】blocking communications (from a phone number or an e-mail address)
kun reading compounds: 拒む【こばむ】to refuse, to reject, to decline, to prevent (from doing), to deny (e.g. access), to block
